original_title: ONE OK ROCK "人生×君=" Tour Live & Film
overview: After launched Jinsei x Boku = in last March ONE OK ROCK announced nation-tour Jinsei x Kimi = in May, 2013. Unlike their previous tour, this time they targeted to play on big venues, so they descreased their venues but added more dates on one venues.
title: ONE OK ROCK:  "Jinsei x Kimi =" Tour Live & Film
